description: Returns information about an AppConfig extension association. For more information about extensions and associations, see Extending workflows in the AppConfig User Guide.

parameters.name: ExtensionAssociationId
parameters.description: The extension association ID to get.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The system-generated ID for the association.

nested_items.name: ExtensionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the extension defined in the association.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARNs of applications, configuration profiles, or environments defined in the association.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The system-generated Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the extension.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: The parameter names and values defined in the association.

nested_items.name: ExtensionVersionNumber
nested_items.description: The version number for the extension defined in the association.
